279480.「おお 我がドルワームの恩人 <pc>よ！ \n よくぞ 参った！:
Oh, if it isn't Dolworm's benefactor,
<pc>! Well done!

279481.「む 見慣れぬ顔があるな。そちらの女性は……？:
Hm? There's an unfamiliar face. Who is that
woman...?

279482.「ユーライザと申します。こちらに いらっしゃる\n 勇者の盟友にして アストルテ:
My name is Yuliza. I am a loyal companion of
the Hero's Ally and Astoltia's greatest
champion, <pc>.

279483.「そ そうか。\n ちと 持ち上げすぎな気もするが\n 確かに その通りじゃのう:
I...I see. A bit of an exaggeration there,
but you're absolutely right.

279484.「本題に入ろう。このドルワーム……\n いや ドワチャッカ大陸全土に\n 大きな:
I'll cut right to the chase. Dolworm...or
rather, all of Dwachakka...is in grave
danger.

279485.「近ごろ ドワチャッカ大陸の中央に位置する\n カルサドラ火山の活動が\n 急激:
Recently, the Calsadora Volcano located in the
center of Dwachakka has been undergoing a
rapid increase in activity.

279486.「我が王立研究院が 保有している\n 火山の観測データと くらべてみても\n 異:
Compared to the institution's research of
volcanic observation data, there is no other
way to describe this but as an anomaly.

279487.「私が計算したところ 近いうちに\n カルサドラ火山は 歴史上\n 類を見ないほ:
My calculations show that in the near future,
the volcano will erupt in a manner
unprecedented in its long history...

279488.「……この大噴火が 起こってしまえば\n ドワチャッカ大陸全土が 火の海と化し\:
...if this eruption were to happen, the entire
continent would be covered in a sea of fire,
and the damage would be catastrophic.

279489.「この異常事態に対し 対策を練るため\n カルサドラ火山に 急きょ\n 調査隊を:
A survey team was quickly dispatched to the
volcano in order to find some kind of
solution. However...

279490.「火口付近に 派遣した調査隊が\n 何日経っても 帰ってこないんだ……。\n 彼:
We sent them inside, and they haven't returned
in days...something must've happened to them!

279491.「……これは おそらく 悪神と化した\n 英雄のしわざです。急ぎ カルサドラ火山:
Perhaps this is the work of the champions
turned fiend... Let's hurry to this volcano
and search for any clues.

279492.「おお！ カルサドラ火山におもむき\n 事態の解決に 協力してくれるというのか。:
Ohh! So you are willing to go to the volcano
to help us solve this matter?! Thank heavens!

279493.「……待って！\n それなら 私も 同行するわ。: Wait! If you're going, then I'm going too.

279495.「ドゥラ院長 王女は やめてと\n 言ってるでしょう？:
Dura. As Princess, I'm ordering you to stop
that.

279496.「カルサドラ火山の異変を 突き止め\n 対策を練るためには 王立研究院の者が\n:
In order to identify the volcano's problem and
take necessary action, they'll need someone
from the research institute to go with them.

279497.「それに……いつも いつも\n あなたには 助けてもらってばかりだもの。\n 私:
Besides...you've always been so helpful to
me. I want to return the favor!

279498.「それならば 私が同行いたします。\n あまりにも 危険すぎる……！:
Then allow me to accompany them! It's too
dangerous for you to...!

279499.「そうだよ チリ！\n 君に もしものことがあったら……:
He's right, Chiri! If something were to happen
to you...

279500.「危険があるからこそ 研究院の指揮を執れる\n ドゥラ院長や 王の後継者たる ラ:
It's too dangerous for the institute's
director or the throne's heir to go along.
It falls to me to take care of this.

279501.「私なら 他の研究員と違って\n <pc>とは よく知った仲だし\n 調査も ス:
Unlike the other researchers, I think I know
<pc> well enough to make sure the
investigation goes smoothly.

279502.「私なら 他の研究員と違って\n <pc>とは よく知った仲だし\n 調査も ス:
Unlike the other researchers, I think I know
<pc> well enough to make sure the
investigation goes smoothly.

279503.「……そこまで言うのであれば チリよ。\n 事態の解決のため 彼らに同行すること:
If you put it that way, then... I understand.
I will leave it to you to accompany them.
We're all counting on you.

279504.「ありがとうございます。国王様！: Thank you very much, your Majesty!

279505.「そういうわけで 私も同行するから よろしく！\n 一緒に カルサドラ火山の火口:
Looks like I'm going with you, then! Let's
head to the crater inside the volcano
together to investigate.

279506.「ラニアッカ断層帯にある オノの祭壇から\n 火口付近に行けるわ。何が起こるか\:
You can get to the crater area from the Axe
Altar in the Raniakka Fault Zone. We won't
know what'll happen, so let's be careful!

279507.<center>ドワチャッカ大陸を 火の海に……！\n我ら 三闘士の過ちを 正す:
Dwachakka must be covered in a sea of fire...!
We must right the wrongs of the Triad...

279508.<center>我が 大願の邪魔は させぬぞ……！\nここから 立ち去れ！:
You shall not interfere with my ambition...!
Begone from this place!

279509.「道を ふさがれてしまったわ。\n これは ちょっとやそっとじゃ\n 突破できそ:
They blocked off this way. I don't think
we'll be getting through this any time
soon...

279512.「どうやら 大地の三闘士の強い想いが\n 我々を 拒絶しているようですね。\n:
It appears that the strong emotions of the
Earthen Triad are rejecting us. We'll have to
find some other way to proceed further...

279513.「あれが 伝説の三闘士様……？\n 三闘士様が この大陸を\n 滅ぼそうとしてい:
Is that the legendary Triad...? The Triad are
the ones trying to destroy the continent?

279515.「来てくれたんだね。ありがとう……。\n ボク きっと あなたが\n 助けにきて:
You really came... Thank you...
I had no doubt that you'd come here to
save us...

279516.「ここは 悪神となったボクらが 創り出した\n ドワチャッカ大陸を 滅ぼしたいと:
This world is the manifestation of our twisted
emotions to destroy Dwachakka, created from
our fiendish desires...

279517.「呪いで魂をけがされ 悪神となってしまったけど\n わずかに残った 正気の部分を:
Though the curse has scarred my soul and transformed me into a fiend, I'm glad I was able to use what little sanity I had left to
reach out to you...

279518.「キミは ボクの……\n ドルワームの血を引く子だね。こんなところで\n 子孫に:
You're my...a descendant of the blood of
Dolworm. To meet one of my descendants
here... I'm...so happy.

279519.「もしかして 古代ドルワーム王国の礎を\n 築いたという 伝説の王……ドルタム様:
Can it be? You're...the legendary king who
laid the foundation of the ancient Dolworm
Kingdom, Doltam...aren't you?! My ancestor?!

279520.「お願い アクロニア鉱山にいる\n 山神イプチャル様のところへ 行って……。:
Please...you must go to the Acronia Mine and
speak to Yppchal, the mountain god...

279521.「イプチャル様なら きっと\n ボクたちを止める方法を ご存知のはず。\n 呪い:
I'm certain Yppchal will know of a way to put
a stop to us. Before this curse completely
swallows us whole...

279522.「ボクらが 大陸を 焼き尽くしてしまう前に……\n ボクらを……兄ちゃんたちを:
Before we burn this land to ash... Please...
You must save us all...!

279523.「山神イプチャル……。\n アクロニア鉱山に おわすという\n 土地神様のことね:
The mountain god, Yppchal...
He is the earthen deity who resides inside
of the Acronia Mine.

279524.「ここにいても しかたがありません。\n ドルタムの言に従い イプチャル神に\n:
Then there is no point in staying here. Let's
follow Doltam's advice and go seek out
Yppchal.

279525.「山神イプチャル様は アクロニア鉱山の\n いちばん奥にある 戒めの地に\n い:
From what I've read, Yppchal resides in the
Cave of Counsel at the far end of the mine.

279526.「アクロニア鉱山は ラニアッカ断層帯からも\n アグラニの町からも 行くことがで:
You can get to the mine in Agrani from the
Raniakka Fault Zone. We have to hurry!

279728.<pc>たちは\n戒めの地に 足を踏み入れた。:
<pc> and co. set foot into the
Cave of Counsel.

279729.<center>カルサドラ火山に宿りし 邪悪なチカラが\nドワチャッカ大陸を 滅:
I sense an evil power inside of the Calsadora
Volcano, and it will soon bring ruin to this
land of Dwachakka...

279730.「私たちは それを食い止めるため 参りました。\n イプチャル様 ドワチャッカ大:
We've come to stop that. Great Yppchal, please
lend us your wisdom on how we can save
Dwachakka from destruction!

279731.<center>うむ。しかし その前に\nそなたたちに カルサドラ火山に巣食う:
Very well...but first, I must tell you about
the fiends lurking inside the volcano, and
the Triad...

279732.<center>彼らの 栄光の果てに\n何が 起こったのかを……。:
What had happened to them at the end of
their days of glory...?

279733.<center>魔物たちが はびこる ドワチャッカ大陸の端\nこのアグラニの地よ:
From this land of Agrani on the edge of the monster-infested Dwachakka...three young people set forth to carve a path throughout
the land, and led their people under the sun.

279734.<center>閃光のオノ 震天の槌 賢哲の盾と呼ばれた若者は\nドワチャッカ大:
The radiant axe, the heavenshaking hammer, and the shield of wisdom...these three established three settlements throughout
Dwachakka, and brought an era of happiness and peace to the Dwarves.

279735.<center>閃光王カブは 人々に言った。\n前進せよ。我らが 大地を切り拓い:
Kabu, the Radiant, said to his people... "Onward. Just as us pioneers carved this land, there is nothing in this world you can't do if
you only just wish for it."

279736.<center>彼らの民は それに従った。\n持ち前の探求心で 発展をとげ\n輝:
His people had followed his words. Driven by their natural curiosity, they flourished, bringing about an era of brilliance and
prosperity.

279737.<center>だが……過ぎたるチカラは 破滅を招いた。: However...too much power only leads to ruin.

279738.<center>急激な発展により 富とチカラを\n手にしたドワーフたちは 自らの:
Acquiring wealth and power through rapid
development, the Dwarves could no longer
control their own desires.

279739.<center>欲に我を忘れ 他人から 奪い 蹴落とし……\n集落同士で 争うよ:
Consumed by greed, they lost themselves, and
began to steal and trample over one another...
Soon, the settlements began to fight.

279740.<center>すでに 年老いてしまった 三闘士に\n民を 止めるチカラはなく\:
The Triad, now grown old, no longer had the
power to stop their people. Conflict continued
to grow worse and worse.

279741.<center>ある日のこと 数十年ぶりに\n閃光王カブが この地を 訪れた……:
One day, for the first time in decades...
Kabu came to this place...

279742.「ここんとこ 若いヤツらは 争ってばかりだ。\n どっちが 上だの下だの くだら:
All young people do these days is fight...
I'm just sick and tired of all this nonsense
about who's better, who's worse...

279743.「……ハハハッ オレが みんなを\n 穴ぐらから 連れださなければ\n ドワーフ:
Hahaha...if I had never led the Dwarves out
of their caves, nobody would be fighting
each other right now.

279744.「オレの本当のきょうだいは 穴ぐらの中で\n 食べ物がなくて 飢えて 死んだんだ:
My actual siblings died of hunger because
there was no food... No one was there to
help or save them.

279745.「みんな 穴ぐらの外に出るのが 怖くて\n まだ小さかった 弟と妹を 見殺しにし:
Everyone was so afraid to leave their caves,
and let their little brothers and sisters
die... There's no way I'd forgive them.

279746.「オレは そんなヤツらを 見返したくて……\n ヤツらとオレは違うって 証明した:
I wanted to show them that I could surpass
them, that I was different from them...so I
left the cave to the outside world.

279747.「自分を信じて 突き進めば\n みんなが幸せに 生きられるって 信じてた。:
If I just believed in myself and kept pushing
on, everyone would be happy...that's what
I believed.

279748.「それなのに オレは いつの間にか\n ドワーフ同士で 争いあう\n 地獄を 作:
And yet...I seem to have created a hell in
which Dwarves fight amongst each other.

279749.「なぁ イプチャルよ……。\n オレたちのしたことは 間違っていたのか？\n オ:
Hey, Yppchal...was what we did wrong...?
Because of me, everyone is...

279750.<center>三闘士が この世を去った後……\n３つの大集落は ガテリア ウル:
After the Triad left this world, the three
great settlements were renamed to Gateria,
Urbea, and Dolworm.

279751.<center>そして ガテリアとウルベアの大戦争で\n多くのドワーフが 殺しあ:
And during the great war between Gateria and
Urbea, many Dwarves died and killed one
another...

279752.<center>三闘士は ドワーフの欲望と 争いの歴史に絶望し\nカルサドラ火山:
In despair over the Dwarves' history of greed and suffering, the Triad seeks to return all to a primitive way of life, consuming
everything with the flames of the Calsadora Volcano.

279753.「悪神となった三闘士を このまま\n 野放しにするわけには いきません。\n 山:
We cannot let them have their way. Great
Yppchal, is there nothing that you can do?

279754.<center>彼らの心の闇を 祓うには\n絶望を凌駕するほどの 希望が必要とな:
To purify the darkness in their hearts, we
need a hope that can surpass their despair.

279755.<center>かつて ドワーフたちに希望をもたらした\n三闘士の武器と 同等の:
The weapons of the Triad once brought hope to the Dwarves...if there is a divine artifact that possesses this same power, it may be able
to shatter their despair.

279756.<center>ドワチャッカ大陸の未来のため この鉱石を託す。\n我のチカラを:
I entrust this ore to you for the future of Dwachakka. This ore contains mine own power, and using it will allow you to create a divine
artifact that shall bring hope.

279758.<center>神器を作るには\nウルベア帝国に伝わる 原初の炎……\nガテリア:
To make this divine artifact, you must use the
Origin Flame in the Urbea Empire...the
secret technique of the Gateria Empire...

279759.<center>そして ドルワーム王国に伝わる\n創造の炉が必要となる。３つのチ:
...as well as the Forge of Making located in
Dolworm. The three must come together
to save the land of Dwachakka...

279760.「手がかりが見つかったのは いいけれど……\n ウルベア帝国と ガテリア皇国は\:
I'm glad we now have some direction, but...
Both the Urbea and Gateria Empires died out
a very long time ago.

279761.「原初の炎も秘伝の術も この世に存在しない。\n それに ドルワームでも 創造の:
The Origin Flame and that secret technique just don't exist...and I've never heard of the Forge of Making, not even in Dolworm...
What do we do...?

279762.「可能性は低いけど……ガテリアに関しては\n ひとつだけ 心当たりがある。\n:
It's a long shot, but...I think I have a lead
regarding Gateria. I'll try my hand at using
the secret technique.

279763.「<pc> あなたは ウルベアの\n 原初の炎について 調べてくれないかしら？\:
Could I ask you to look into the Origin Flame?
I apologize for being unreasonable, but...

279764.「お互い 調査が終わったら\n ドルワーム水晶宮の玉座の間で 集合しましょ。\n:
Let's meet in the throne room in the palace
when we finish our findings. We can discuss
more about the Forge of Making there.

279765.「大昔に 滅んでしまった国の宝を探すとは\n ずいぶんな 難題ですね。\n ……:
Searching for a treasure of a country long
gone is quite the daunting task...it'd likely
be impossible for someone other than you.

279766.「当時の ウルベアの王族なら 原初の炎について\n 何か知っているはず。……あな:
The Urbean royalty of that time must've known
something about the Origin Flame... Are you
thinking what I'm thinking?

279767.「今こそ あなたの持つ 時渡りのチカラを使い\n ３０００年前の 古代ウルベア帝:
You can use your time-traveling power to
travel back 3,000 years to the ancient Urbea
Empire. Make the impossible possible!

279768.ルーラストーンの メニューの中にある\nエテーネルキューブを使い\n３０００年前:
Use the Ethenel Cube in the "Zoomstone" menu
to travel to the Urbea Empire Castle 3000
years into the past.

279769.「どうも 気恥ずかしいねぇ こういうの……。\n あー あー……コホン。:
Hello... This kind of stuff is so
embarrassing... Ah, ah... ahem.

279770.「……原初の炎を 手にせし者よ。\n 我は 大地の三闘士がひとり\n 震天の槌:
To you who holds the Origin Flame in your
hand. I am Nanna, the skyshaking hammer
of the Earthen Triad.

279771.「この原初の炎は 開拓の旅の途中\n カルサドラ火山の火口にて 手に入れた聖火。:
This Origin Flame is a sacred fire we found in the Calsadora Volcano's crater during our pioneering. It brought great prosperity to
our settlement.

279772.「だが 決して この繁栄に慢心してはならぬ。\n 畏れの心を忘れし者に 炎は牙を:
However, we must never become too complacent with this prosperity. Those who forget the fear in their hearts will know the flame's
wrath, which consumes all...

279773.「どうか この炎を 我が民を\n 正しき未来に導くため 使ってほしい。\n それ:
Please use this flame to lead our people to
a prosperous future. That is what we desire...

279774.「ガーッハッハッハッハ！ いいぞぅ ナンナ！\n 威厳たっぷりの 王様って感じで:
Gahahaha! Nanna, you're amazing! You're
totally rocking the whole royalty thing, just
like a king! You're so cool!

279775.「わわっ 兄ちゃん！\n まだ 撮ってるんだから しゃべっちゃダメっ！: H-hey! Don't talk! We're still recording!

279776.「ちきしょーッ！ せっかく カッコつけてたのに\n 最後の最後で 台無しだよ！！:
Damn it! I was trying so hard to look cool
for everyone, but you just HAD to ruin it!!
YOU BIG IDIOTー!!!

279777.「……今のお方が １０００年前\n ドワチャッカ大陸を開拓し 我がウルベア帝国の:
That woman you just saw was Nanna, the Heavenshaker. 1000 years ago, she pioneered Dwachakka and laid the Urbea Empire's
foundation.

279778.「武勇ばかりが 目立って 伝えられておるが\n 民を愛し 集落の発展のため\n:
Although the legends really only praise her bravery, she truly loved her people and devoted more effort to the development of
the settlements than anyone else.

279779.「幼いころ 父上から\n ナンナ様の伝説を 数多く聞いてのう……。\n 彼女のよ:
When I was little, my father told me many
stories about the great Nanna...and I longed
to be a great ruler, just like her.

279780.「この原初の炎は ウルベアの発展を支えた秘宝。\n これがあったおかげで 我が帝:
The Origin Flame is a treasure that's helped to maintain Urbea's developments. Because of it, this empire has become the greatest
on the entire continent.

279782.「そちも知っての通り 先の大戦で\n 我が国は ガテリア皇国を滅ぼした。\n 我:
As you already know...we destroyed Gateria in
the previous war. We made a terrible
mistake...

279783.「多くのドワーフが殺しあい……死んでいった。\n もし あの光景を ナンナ様が見:
Many Dwarves killed one another and died...
If Nanna were here to see that, she would've
been devastated.

279784.「だから わらわは 民に誓ったのじゃ。: So that is why I swore to my people...

279785.「ゆがんだ時代を正し 思いなかばに\n 散っていった者たちが 託した未来を\n:
We will right the wrongs of this warped age...
and grasp firmly in our hands the future
entrusted to us by those who died...

279786.「あのような悲劇を 二度と生むことのない\n 新たな時代 新たなウルベアを築くと:
We will build a new era, a new Urbea where
such a horrible tragedy will never happen
again.

279787.「いや……ウルベアだけではない。\n わらわは わらわのすべてを\n このドワチ:
No...not just Urbea. I will devote my entire
being to making the entirety of Dwachakka a
better place.

279788.「すべての民を この大陸を\n わらわは 一生をかけて 守ってみせる。:
I will protect the people and this continent
for as long as I live.

279789.「ひとつだけ 聞かせてほしい。\n これは この大陸の未来のため\n 必要なこと:
Just tell me one thing... Is this necessary
for the future of Dwachakka?<yesno><close>

279790.「よろしい。ウルベアの英雄である そちになら\n 安心して この炎を 託すことが:
Very well. You are the savior of Urbea, after
all. I can safely entrust the flame to you.
Please take it with care.

279792.「わらわの知らない場所で\n そちは 戦ってくれておるのじゃな。\n ドワチャッ:
You are fighting your battle in a place I
do not know...the future of Dwachakka is now
in your hands.

279793.原初の炎を 手に入れたので\n現代の ドルワーム王国 水晶宮の\n玉座の間へ 向:
Take the Origin Flame to the throne room of
the Dolworm Crystal Palace in the present
day Dolworm Kingdom.

279794.「おかえりなさい。\n 原初の炎のことは 何かわかった……？:
Welcome back. Were you able to find anything
out about the Origin Flame...?

279795.チリに 原初の炎を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>:
Give the Origin Flame to Chiri?
<yesno><close>

279796.「……なーんか 怪しいわね。\n もしかして 何か 隠したりしてない？:
...that's a bit suspicious. You're not hiding
something from me, are you?

279797.チリに 原初の炎を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>:
Give the Origin Flame to Chiri?
<yesno><close>

279798.「これが ウルベア帝国に伝わるという秘宝\n 原初の炎……！ いったい どうやっ:
This is the Origin Flame, the treasure of the
Urbea Empire...! How the heck did you get
this?

279799.「……いいえ。あなたは いつだって\n 不可能を 可能にしてきたものね。\n 何:
No...you're always doing the impossible.
At this point, I suppose it's really no
surprise.

279800.「そうそう。こっちも\n 強力な助っ人を 呼んできたの！\n ふふっ……誰だと:
That's right! I called in somebody here
who'll be a huge help to us! Hehe...
Guess who?

279801.「おおお！ 懐かしき戦友 <pc>よ！\n 久しぶりであるな！:
Oooooh! If it isn't my old comrade,
<pc>! It's been some time!

279802.「余は かのガテリア皇国の 正統なる継承者\n 第一の皇子 ビャン・ダオ！:
I am Byan Dao, rightful heir to the throne
and first prince of Gateria!

279803.「チリから ドワチャッカ大陸の一大事と\n しらせを受けてな。急ぎ\n 遺跡の調:
I received word from Chiri that something
major was happening in Dwachakka. I just
returned from a survey of the ruins.

279804.「すでに 話は聞きおよんでおる。\n イプチャル神の鉱石を 加工するため\n 我:
I've already been filled in. You require
Gateria's secret technique to process
Yppchal's Ore, yes?

279805.「この巻物は ガテリア皇国の王族に\n 伝わる秘宝……。３０００年前から\n 余:
I've had this scroll in my possession for
3,000 years now...it's a treasure of Gateria's
royal family.

279806.「ここには ガテリアの技術のすべて……\n 三闘士の神器の材料とされる\n 鉱石:
It describes in detail all of the techniques
Gateria used to process the ore that created
the Triad's divine artifacts.

279807.「本来ならば ガテリアの王族以外の者の\n 閲覧は 固く 禁じられておるが……:
By law, it is strictly forbidden for anyone
outside of the royal family to view its
contents...

279808.「そちを始め この時代で知り合った\n 大切な友人たちを 守るためならば\n こ:
I, Byan Dao, will do everything I can to
protect you and all of the friends I have
made in this age!

279809.「これで ウルベアの原初の炎\n ガテリアの秘術は そろった……。\n 残るは:
Now that we have Urbea's Origin Flame and the
secret technique of Gateria...all that's left
is Dolworm's Forge of Making...

279810.「それについては わしから 話をしよう。: Allow me to explain about that.

279811.「……創造の炉は 確かに\n このドルワームに 存在する。:
The Forge of Making does indeed exist here
in Dolworm.

279812.「お前たちが その存在を知らぬのは無理もない。\n ドルワームの 代々の王にのみ:
That you do not know of its existence is not surprising. Through tradition of word of mouth, the successive kings of Dolworm have
kept its existence a well guarded secret.

279813.「炉への道を 開けるのは\n 太陽の石をあつかえる 王族の者のみ……。\n 今こ:
Only those of royalty with access to the Sun
Stone may open the way to the Forge...
I will now show the way to you.

279814.「太陽の石のチカラを使い\n そなたたちに 炉におもむく\n 資格を 与えた。:
By the Sun Stone's power, I have granted you
the necessary permission to enter the Forge.

279815.「水晶宮の４階 神カラクリの横にある\n 操作盤をしらべ 創造の炉へ 向かうのだ:
Use the control panel next to the Divine
Machine on the palace's fourth floor to get
there. I'll explain everything there.

279817.「これが 創造の炉……！: So this is the Forge of Making...!

279818.「４０００年前 ドルワームの礎を築いたとされる\n 賢哲王ドルタム様の手によって:
It was created 4,000 years ago by the wise
king Doltam. It's said he laid the foundation
of Dolworm.

279819.「太陽の石の 膨大なエネルギーを 用いることで\n どんな鉱石をも 加工すること:
By harnessing the incredible energy of the Sun
Stone, any ore can be processed. There's
nothing that this forge cannot create.

279820.「三闘士の神器をはじめ ドワーフたちの\n 文明を支える 様々なものが\n 創造:
From the Forge of Making came the divine artifacts of the Triad, as well as various other creations that supported Dwarven
civilization.

279821.「だが……やがて この炉によって\n 人殺しの道具までもが 作られるように\n:
However...it was not long before this forge
was used to make tools intended for killing.

279822.「誰よりも 争いごとを嫌っていた \n 心優しきドルタム様は 事態を憂い\n こ:
The kind-hearted Doltam hated conflict more
than anyone...his great concern led to the
Forge being sealed deep underground.

279823.「悪しき心を持つ者に 利用されぬよう\n 代々の王にのみ 創造の炉の存在は伝えら:
This forge's existence has been hidden for a very long time, passed down only to successive kings so that it could never be used by those
with evil in their hearts.

279824.「……だが 今は そんなことを\n 言っていられる状況ではない。\n 代々の王も:
...however, the same cannot be said in our
current situation. I am sure the kings of the
past will forgive us for what we must do.

279825.「今こそ ドワチャッカ大陸を救うため\n ３つのチカラを 合わせるとき。\n 創:
We must now combine the power of the three to
save Dwachakka. We will use the Forge to
create the divine artifact!

279828.「武器ではなく クワの形にしたのは\n 三闘士が 人々と共に 大地を開拓した際\:
The reason I chose the shape of a hoe instead of a weapon is because of the legend of the Earthen Triad, where they and their people
used hoes while they pioneered the land.

279831.「三国を代表し ドルワーム王国の者が\n そのクワを扱うべきだと 私は思います。:
I think that it should be handled by a representative of the three countries as well as someone from Dolworm. Chiri...would you be
willing to come with us?

279834.「覚えておるかの？ \n ウルベア魔神兵の中にあった\n リウ老師から 受け継い:
Do you remember this? It was once one of the
seeds that Master Liu handed down to me inside
the Urbea Aztech.

279835.「あれから このタネを 誠心誠意\n 愛情をこめて 育ててな……。\n やっと:
Since then, I've nurtured the seed with much
tender love and care...and finally, I've
managed to help it grow this much.

279836.「我が祖国 ガテリアの希望の象徴じゃ。\n これがあれば 災いを起こしているとい:
It's a symbol of hope for my homeland of
Gateria. Perhaps it will do well to calm
Kabu's feelings of destruction.

279844.<pc>たちは\n三闘士たちに対抗するための 神器づくりに\n寝る間も惜しんで:
<pc> and co. worked tirelessly to
the point of losing sleep to create the divine
artifact to be used against the Triad...

279845.「これこそ ドルワーム ガテリア ウルベアの\n チカラを結集して作った神器……:
This is the divine artifact borne from the
combined power of Dolworm, Gateria, and
Urbea...the Hoe of Hope!

279846.「未来と希望を 切り拓くための神器……。\n これなら きっと！:
A divine artifact that will carve out the
future and give us hope...this surely can do
it!

279847.「そのクワには 三国の……\n ドワチャッカ大陸の未来を 想う者たちの\n 尊い:
This hoe is filled with precious wishes of
those looking to the future of the three
countries...of all of Dwachakka.

279848.「チリ。\n 僕たちは ここで 信じて待ってる。\n ドワチャッカの未来を よろ:
We'll all be rooting for you here, Chiri. The
future of Dwachakka's in your hands!

279849.「<pc> そちに これを授けよう。: I'd like to give you this, <pc>.

279851.「さぁ カルサドラ火山へ 向かいましょう。\n 三闘士様たちの 深い絶望を\n:
Okay, let's make our way to the Calsadora
Volcano. This Hoe of Hope will shatter the
Triad's deep despair!

279852.「お願いです ナンナ様！\n ドワチャッカ大陸を 滅びから救うため\n チカラを:
Please, great Nanna! Please help us to save
all of Dwachakka from destruction!

279853.「ったく うるさいねぇ。\n アタシのことは ほっといてくれって\n 言ってるだ:
Jeez, so annoying... I told you to just
leave me alone...

279854.「アタシたちの願いは カルサドラ火山を\n 噴火させ 二度と争いが起こらないよう:
Our desire is to cause Calsadora Volcano to
erupt, returning this land to a pristine state
where conflict can never again exist...

279855.「それが 三闘士の……兄者の望みなんだ。\n 他でもない 兄者がそう望むなら\n:
That is what the Triad...my brothers...desire.
If that is what my siblings wish, then I will
happily follow!

279856.「……アンタらは 知ってんだろ？\n 兄者の作った国……ガテリアの末路を。\n:
You already know, don't you...? What happened
to Gateria, the land created by my brother...
My country of Urbea destroyed it.

279857.「アタシの民が……兄者の愛した国を！ 民を！\n すべてを殺し 踏みにじったんだ:
My people...the country my brother loved...!
Those damn people killed and trampled over
everything! How can that ever be forgiven?!

279858.「それは のちの子孫が 引き起こしたこと。\n あなたの落ち度では ありません！:
That was the doing of your descendants. It's
not your fault! That's why...

279859.「……だまれぇぇぇぇッ！！\n アンタに アタシたちの何がわかるッ！？:
Shut UP!!!! What could you possibly know about
us?!

279860.「アンタらなんかに アタシたちの……！\n 兄者の悲しみが……痛みが\n わかっ:
You have no right to understand our...my
brother's pain, his sorrow... There's no way
you could ever understand!

279861.「どんなに 裏切られようが！\n 兄者は 大陸の民を 誰よりも愛し\n 死ぬ直前:
No matter how much betrayal there was, he
loved the people of this land and believed in
them all until the day he died...

279862.「アタシが……アタシの国が……\n そんな兄者の想いを つぶしちまった。\n 取:
My...my country... I crushed my brother's
feelings into nothing! I've done something
irreversible!

279863.「今のアタシたちが 間違ってることくらい\n 本当は わかってる……わかってるん:
I understand well that what we're doing right
now is wrong, I do! But... but I...!

279864.「止めどない 憤怒と絶望が\n ずっと アタシを 責めつづける……。\n どうし:
Unending anger and despair just continue to
haunt me... I don't know what to do...!

279868.「姉ちゃん……ウルベアは ガテリアを滅ぼした。\n だけどね ガテリアのすべてが:
Sis... Gateria was destroyed by Urbea. But
you know what? Not all has been lost.

279869.「この苗や そのクワを作った技術のように\n 今も 確かに 生きつづけるものがあ:
There are things that live on even today,
like that seedling and the technique used to
make that hoe. In our land of Dwachakka...

279870.「だからこそ 兄ちゃんを 止めなくちゃ。\n 兄ちゃんの愛した民を 大地を 希望:
That's why I have to stop Kabu. I can't let
the people he loves and the hope of this
land crumble within his own hands...

279871.「そうなったら 兄ちゃんは\n 今よりも もっともっと\n 苦しむことに なるか:
If that's to happen, then he'll suffer even
more than he is now...

279872.「……ハハッ ざまぁないね。\n 姉貴分として アンタの前では\n 情けない姿な:
Haha, I guess there's no helping it, then...
I didn't want you to see the pathetic side
of your big sister.

279873.「なぁ その苗さ……\n アタシが 持っててもいいかい？:
Hey, about that seedling... Do you mind if
I hold onto it?

279874.「お願いだ。\n アタシに 勇気を……。\n 前に進むためのチカラを 分けてくれ:
Please... Give me the courage...and the
strength to keep on pushing!

279875.「……兄者は この先にいる。\n 行こう <pc>！\n アタシたちの手で この:
My brother is just up ahead... Come on!
Let's end this nightmare together!

280859.「よう……思ったより 早かったじゃねぇか。\n ……<cs_pchero>。:
Hey...you got here quicker than I thought
you would, <cs_pchero>...

280860.「見ろよ このながめ……。\n これが オレの望む 新たな世界の姿だ。:
Check out this view...
This is the new world that I want.

280861.「オレが 外に連れだしちまったから\n ドワーフ同士で 殺しあうなんて\n バカ:
It was all because I led them outside...
Dwarves began to stupidly kill one
another...

280862.「前に進まなければ 希望さえ持たなければ……\n 何も 起こりはしない。オレの民:
If we don't move ahead, if we have no hope...
then nothing will happen. My people can
finally live peaceful lives without conflict.

280863.「オレは！ オレの犯した 過ちを正す。\n 争いの歴史と 争いのもととなるすべて:
I...I will right my wrongs! I will burn away
the history of conflict and all that leads to
it! This land will be pristine!

280864.「それがッ！ ドワチャッカ大陸の\n 新たな神となる オレたちの初仕事ってわけだ:
And that...is the first duty as the new god
of Dwachakka! Gahahahaha!!

280865.「兄者！ もうやめるんだ……！\n こんなことしても どうにもならないんだ！\n:
Stop this! This will not solve anything! You
have to snap out of it!

280866.「おっ どこ行ってたんだよ お前ら！\n どっか消えたと 思ったらさ……。\n:
Oh, where the heck have you two been?! I
thought you guys just up and vanished...
Hey...what's that look for?

280867.「大勢のドワーフが 殺しあった……。\n オレのせいで ドワチャッカ大陸は\n:
So many Dwarves killed one another...
It's because of ME that Dwachakka was
destroyed!

280868.「オレは……オレは……\n みんなのことを 幸せにしたかったのに\n この大陸を:
I...I just...I just wanted to make everyone
happy, but...I turned this place into a
living hell...

280869.「弟をッ！ 妹をッ！\n 見殺しにしたヤツらのほうが 正しかったんだ。\n 穴ぐ:
Both my little brother and sister... Those who
left them to die were right all along! If only
we had never left our cave, then...!

280870.「……そうだ！\n 外の世界に 夢さえ見なければ\n こんなことには ならなかっ:
That's right! If only I'd never dreamed of
going to the outside world, none of this
would've ever happened!!

280871.「オレは オレ自身を 許せないッ！\n 愛する民のために オレは オレの過ちを…:
I...I can't forgive myself!! For the sake of
my beloved people, I will burn this land to
nothing to atone for my mistakes!!

280874.「ア……アア……！ 抑エラレナイ……！\n 我ラノ絶望 我ラノ憤怒\n 炎トナリ:
A....AH.... I CANNOT HOLD IT ANY LONGER...!
OUR DESPAIR, OUR ANGER... IT WILL BECOME THE
FLAME THAT BURNS EVERYTHING AWAY...

280875.「アハハッ！ ドワチャッカ大陸ヲ 火ノ海ニ。\n 何モカモ ブッツブースッ！:
AHAHA! DWACHAKKA WILL BECOME A SEA OF FLAMES!
EVERYTHING WILL BE DESTROYED!

280876.「我ラノ過チヲ 正スベシ……。\n スベテハ 愛スル民ノタメニッ！！！:
WE MUST RIGHT OUR WRONGS...
FOR THE PEOPLE WE CHERISH SO DEARLY!!

280877.「ふざけたこと 言わないで！\n そんなこと 絶対に させないわ！:
What a load of junk! There's no way I'm
gonna let you do that!

280879.「悪神よ 貴様の思い通りには させぬ！\n その憤怒 ここで断たせてもらう！:
I will not let you do as you wish, you fiend!
Your wrath will be stoppedーhere and now!

280880.「三闘士全員が 完全に\n 呪炎に 飲まれてしまったようですね……。\n 手強い:
It's as if the curse has completely consumed
them all... They will no doubt be formidable!
Please be careful!

280881.「クッ…… なんという執念。\n これでは 呪炎を切り離せない……！:
Ggh...they're really persistent. This isn't
enough to get rid of the curse!

280882.「オレノ 過 チ……。\n ス ベテ 焼キ 尽クス……。\n スベテ ハ 民ノ:
MY... MISTAKES...
I WILL... BURN THEM ALL... AWAY...
FOR THE SAKE... OF MY PEOPLE...!

280883.「いいかげんに……目を 覚ましなさいッ！！\n この 大バカ者ッッッ！！！:
That's enough....just snap out it already!
You gigantic idiot!!!

280884.「たしかに 私たち ドワーフは\n 自らの欲に 目がくらみ\n 愚かな争いを 続:
It is true that we Dwarves have foolishly
fought against one another, blinded by
our own greed...

280885.「歴史上幾度も 争いが くり返され\n ドワーフ同士で 殺しあってきた。:
There have been many wars throughout our
history, our fellow Dwarves killing one
another.

280886.「あなたたちから 見れば\n 私たちの歴史は いびつで\n ひどく 醜いものかも:
From your perspective, our history probably
seems twisted... Horribly ugly, even...

280888.「あなたたち三闘士が 希望を与えてくれたから\n 多くの間違いを犯し もがき 苦:
The Triad gave us hope...even as we struggled,
suffered, made countless mistakes...our
ancestors were able to push forward.

280889.「あなたたちがくれた 希望を！\n 私たちが 歩んできた この歴史を……\n 否:
With the hope that you have given us...I won't
let you deny the history we worked so hard
to create!!

280890.「これは ガテリアの民が残した希望だ。\n どれだけ 踏みつけられても 決して潰:
This is the hope left behind by Gateria's people. No matter how much it's been trampled on, it'll never be crushed. Pretty gutsy for
such a small little thing, don't you think?

280891.「ボクらの民は 兄ちゃんが思うほど 弱くない。\n どんな絶望的な状況に陥ったっ:
Our people are not as weak as you think. No
matter how much things seem hopeless, we can
always keep moving forward with hope!

280892.「お願い キミの手で……未来を 切り拓いて！\n 絶望の大地に 希望の花を 咲か:
I beg you... You carve a path to the future!
Let the flowers of hope bloom in this land
of despair!

280893.「閃光王カブよ。\n この花が ドワチャッカの……\n 私たちドワーフの 希望の:
Kabu, the Radiant! This flower is
Dwachakka's...no, all of the Dwarves' hope
given form!

280894.「希望……コレガ オレタチガ\n ズット 追イ求メテイタ ヒ…カリ……。:
HOPE... THIS IS... THE LIGHT WE'VE BEEN
HOPELESSLY SEARCHING FOR...

280895.「希望の光で 悪神の憤怒が 抑え込まれている！\n ……今です！ 神剣レクタリス:
With the light of hope, the fiend's wrath is
being suppressed! Use the divine sword to cut
through the Triad's curse!

280897.「へへへっ！\n お前の説教 ガツンと効いたぜ。\n ずいぶん骨のある 嬢ちゃん:
Heheheh! Your little speech really touched
me. You're one tough girl!

280898.「現代のドワチャッカ大陸に生きる 娘よ。\n 我の過ちを正し 救ってくれたこと\:
To my daughter, who lives in the Dwachakka of
today... You have my heartfelt thanks for
setting right my mistakes and saving me.

280899.「穴ぐらの外の世界で……\n お前たちが 紡いでいく未来を\n 楽しみにしている:
From the world outside the caves...I'm looking
forward to the future you'll create for
yourselves.

280900.「ガッハッハッ！ まーた\n お前に 助けられちまったな。\n さっすが オレた:
Gahahaha! You've saved me yet AGAIN!
I'd expect nothing less from you! That's
our <cs_pchero>!

280901.「まったく 調子に乗んじゃないよ。\n この……バカ兄者！ みんなに\n どんだ:
Sheesh, don't get carried away now! You...
big dummy. Don't you have any idea how
much trouble you've caused everyone?!

280902.「へ へへ……。大暴れしたからか\n なんだか 疲れちまった。\n 身体に チカ:
Heh, heh heh... It's probably because of my
rampage, but I'm feeling pretty beat. My
body's completely drained...

280903.「オレたちは フォーリオンに戻って\n いったん 眠ることにする…ぜ……。\n:
We'll head back to Fourion so we can all get
some much needed...rest...
Thanks, <cs_pchero>...

280904.「……三闘士が 神化の儀に挑んだのは\n 故郷である ドワチャッカ大陸を\n 守:
The Triad chose to undergo the deification
ritual because of a single-minded desire to
protect their homeland...

280905.「そんな 尊い願いを……\n このようなモノで ゆがめるなんて\n 絶対に 許せ:
I will not allow such a noble wish to be
distorted by these foul things!

280906.「……ユーライザさん。\n さっきは かばってくれて ありがとう。\n あなたは:
Thank you for coming to my rescue earlier,
Yuliza. You saved my life.

280907.「べ 別に……\n 礼を 言われるほどのことは\n していませんので……！:
But I didn't... I haven't done anything worthy
of your gratitude!

280908.「私たちの未来……か。\n この花のように 希望あふれるものに\n なれば いい:
Our future, huh... I hope it will be filled
with as much hope as this little flower.

280909.「ううん。私たちの手で そうしていかなきゃね。\n 三闘士様が愛した この大陸を:
Uh uh. We've gotta do it ourselves. The
Triad cherishes this land so much...so
we'll always keep it safe, no matter what.

280910.「これで 火山の噴火は 止められたみたいね。\n ふふっ ドワチャッカ大陸を 救:
Looks like we stopped the volcano from
erupting... Hehe! We owe you big time for
helping us save Dwachakka!

280911.「さて！ 私は 研究員のみんなを連れて\n ドルワーム水晶宮に 戻るわ。あなたは:
Anyways, I'm headed back to the palace with
all of the researchers. You should report back
to the throne room and tell the King!

282312.<center>我が名は 山神イプチャル。\nアクロニア鉱山に 恵みを与え\nこ:
My name is Yppchal, god of the mountain. I
have blessed the Acronia Mine and watch
over the Dwarves of this land.

290518.「……まったく こんなときに\n 冗談を言うものでは ないぞよ？\n この大陸の:
Honestly...you really think now is the time
to be joking? This is necessary for the future
of Dwachakka, isn't it?<yesno><close>
